app.title: MarkPDFdown Server
app.instruction: Instructions: Upload PDF files, and the system will automatically use multimodal large models (GPT-4o, Claude 3.5, Gemini 1.5) for high-precision Markdown conversion.
app.footer: MarkPDFdown Server Â©{{year}} Created by deep-diver

upload.dragText: Click or drag file to this area to upload
upload.hint: Support for multiple PDF files. Files will be processed in batch.

task.title: Processing Tasks

deleteConfirm.title: Confirm Delete
deleteConfirm.content: Are you sure you want to delete this task? This action cannot be undone.

task.downloadFail: Download failed, please try again later
